name: @serenity-is/sleekgrid
description: A modern Data Grid / Spreadsheet component

scripts.doc: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --exclude **/lib/**/* --excludePrivate --readme none --githubPages false --hidePageHeader --sourceLinkTemplate https://github.com/serenity-is/sleekgrid/blob/master/{path}#L{line} --readme none --out /serenity-is/SerenityIs/SerenityIs.Web/Docs/api/js/sleekgrid --json ./out/typedoc.json src
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm build:full && pnpm run test --coverage && pnpm dts
scripts.www: pnpm build:full && cd docs && jekyll serve --livereload --config _config.yml,_config_local.yml

author: Volkan Ceylan, Furkan Evran, Victor Tomaili (https://serenity.is)
